name: Cube Racer 2 - ALPHAtesting
description:
Screw up your friends in the fairest way possible. Unleash your rage in this free to play multiplayer online racing platformer called Cube Racer 2.
Race against your friends and fill the stage with a huge amount of different obstacles alternately. Each round all the built obstacles come together so everyone has the same chance to win.

Join the Discord for all the news and to give us your feedback for the game:
https://discord.gg/zJcUFFPxVv

Cube Racer 2 is huge fun to play with your friends having a spicy time together until the first person gets tilted. Try it out! It's worth it.


Each round gives points. Position, height in goal, helpful obstacles & deadly obstacles. Try to be the best Cube after driving 6 rounds against your friends.
